summary: Beginning in FY 2026, estimated federal government land acreage—categorized by usage—will be reported in audited federal financial statements. To prepare for the transition to this requirement, agencies have been required to report land acreage as unaudited information in their annual financial reports since FY 2022. We worked with the Council of the Inspectors General on Integrity and Efficiency to develop this guidance for FY 2024...
title: Financial Audit Guidance: FY 2024 and FY 2025 Audit Procedures for Government Land
